alert.note: Alert for Northern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Piscataquis County through 430 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Chesuncook, or 22 miles northwest of Ripogenus. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chesuncook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
